title: Jingle Land
subtitle: The Land of Music and Entertainment
location: Palm Meadows, Prestige Ozone, Whitefield Main Road, Whitefield, Devasandra Industrial Estate, Krishnarajapura
description:
Hello Music Enthusiasts! JINGLE LAND is here!
Experience the electrifying atmosphere of a musical extravaganza as diverse bands unite on one stage. Vibrant melodies fill the air, ranging from soulful ballads to heart-pounding rhythms. Enthusiastic crowds sway in harmony, immersed in the pulsating energy of live performances. Each band will bring its unique flair, captivating audiences with its raw talent and infectious passion.

title: Core Summer Festival Bangalore

description:

Can’t wait to meet up with magical unicorns, trippy mermaids, and our favorite #fashion, #Culture, and #art lovers this June!! 😀 🌈🌺🌴🦋

location: 40-3, St Mark's Rd, Srinivas Nagar, Shanthala Nagar, Ashok Nagar

title: Paint Bar- Guided Workshops
subtitle: Anyone can paint
location: 4th Floor, Sankey Tank, 8th, Main, 10th Cross Rd, above wonderslate office, Sadashiva Nagar
description: Open house- paint anything. Join us for a fun Paint Party! Unwind and get creative with easy-to-follow instructions and all painting supplies provided. Perfect for beginners or experienced painters alike. Whether solo, with family, or friends, it's guaranteed fun!

title: Sing for KK: The Mega Tribute Concert
subtitle: Alive India Fundraiser & Awareness Concert
location: 56, Commissariat Rd, Ashok Nagar, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560001
description:
Why This Concert is Special:
Experience the captivating and electrifying performance delivered by Alive India Rockstars
Sing along to the illustrious repertoire of KKs melodious tunes
Join us for an unforgettable night as celebrity artists unite to celebrate the timeless music of KK!
This isn't just another concert; it's the Alive India Fundraiser & Awareness Concert, aiming to support deserving musicians through the Alive India Music Foundation NGO's MSR (Musicians Social Responsibility) Campaign, "Sing to Save - Changing Lives Through Music" mission. Our goal is to provide musicians with essentials like free food, shelter, upskill training, and sustainable career opportunities.

title: Swarathma India Tour — Powered by the Sun
location: Whitefield Main Rd, Devasandra Industrial Estate, Mahadevpura
description: With the Raushan India Tour, legendary folk-rock band Swarathma (Pyaasi, Kaash, Raushan, Naane Daari, Raah E Fakira) invite you to a celebration of their new album Raushan, with music that’s fun, epic and sustainable. Known for their remarkable storytelling, Swarathma’s 20-year long journey has been marked by innovation and creativity including the live collaborations with AI, massive interactive showcases and cross-cultural music. Building on this blueprint, the iconic folk-rockers are setting out on a nationwide tour to celebrate songs from the new album as well as classic favourites, and ring in many a core memory with you. See you on the Raushan Tour, in your city!

title: Aggressive Tendencies: The Gathering
location: 1st floor of Gillys redefined,# 413, 100 Feet Road,, 4th Block, Koramangala, KHB Block Koramangala, Koramangala 4-B Block, 5th Block, Koramangala
description: After 30 successful editions, Aggressive Tendencies is expanding its horizons to Bangalore, presenting one of its most monumental shows yet and unveiling an exciting new event: THE GATHERING. Prepare for the most brutal midweek gathering, showcasing the most intense lineup of the year featuring DEFEATED SANITY, GODLESS, and ANORECTAL ULCERATION. Join us for an unforgettable night of unbridled energy and unparalleled performances. Don't miss out on this epic installment of Aggressive Tendencies as we kick off a new era with The Gathering.

title: Houseparty
subtitle: The Wildest Of Them All
location: 614/615, 2nd Stage, 12th Main Road, Indiranagar
description:
Bangalore, Get ready for a party like no other!

We're thrilled to announce the return of Houseparty at Nevermind, with an experience that's bigger and better than ever before!
Say Goodbye to your regular clubbing nights and say hello to the coolest new way to party, complete with exciting games, the grooviest beats, and vibes like no other!
The only place where you can play, drink, dance, eat, and vibe all at once. 
Can't wait to see you all there, RSVP now!

title: SCC SkyCinema - Yeh Jawaani Hai Deewani
subtitle: When the sun goes down the show comes on
location: 1/2, Old Madras Rd, Halasuru, Someshwarpura, Sivanchetti Gardens
description:
"Life mein jitna bhi try karo, kuch na kuch toh chhootega hi. Toh jahaan hai, wahi ka maza lete hai."- Yeh Jawaani Hai Deewani

Witness the heartwarming tale of Bunny and Naina as they navigate the complexities of love and friendship. Experience the highs and lows, the laughter and tears with Sunset Cinema Club at 1 mg - Lido Mall.

Enjoy your favorite movie on a breezy terrace, perched on the rooftop of 1 mg- Lido Mall. Here you'll have an unobstructed view of the night sky, creating a unique and immersive cinema experience as you sink into comfy bean bags and watch the movie on a large screen with the skyline of the city as your backdrop.

title: SCC SkyCinema - Before Sunset
subtitle: When the sun goes down the show comes on
location: 1/2, Old Madras Rd, Halasuru, Someshwarpura, Sivanchetti Gardens
description:
"You can never replace anyone because everyone is made up of such beautiful specific details." - Before Sunset 

Join us for a magical evening of romance and nostalgia as Sunset Cinema Club presents a screening of this beloved film! Experience the timeless beauty of love, connection, and second chances under the twinkling night sky at 1 MG - Lido Mall.

Enjoy your favorite movie on a breezy terrace, perched on the rooftop of 1 mg- Lido Mall. Here you'll have an unobstructed view of the night sky, creating a unique and immersive cinema experience as you sink into comfy bean bags and watch the movie on a large screen with the skyline of the city as your backdrop.

title: Chikmagalur Weekend Getaway
subtitle: Experience serenity of Coffee Land
location: #467, CK Complex, 479, 4th Ave St, Teacher's Colony, 1st Block Koramangala, HSR Layout 5th Sector
description: This paradise of misty hills and lush green tea and coffee plantations is a sweet escape from the noisy city life, resting peacefully at a height of 3,400 ft. Get ready to immerse yourself in the arms of nature! Whether you’re a thrill-seeker or a nature lover, Chikmagalur’s got you covered. Hike through the rugged terrain, or take a dip in one of the many cascading waterfalls, there’s so much to explore.

title: Coorg Weekend Getaway
subtitle: Experience the scotland of India
location: #467, CK Complex, 479, 4th Ave St, Teacher's Colony, 1st Block Koramangala, HSR Layout 5th Sector
description: Time to put on your adventure hat and escape to a place where relaxation and thrill collide in the most tantalizing way possible! Imagine waking up to the aroma of freshly ground coffee beans surrounded by lush greenery worthy of a postcard. Get ready to explore winding trails and stunning waterfalls, trading city life for an unforgettable adventure that will stay with you forever. Coorg's calling, are you ready

title: Wayanad Weekend Getaway
subtitle: Break the shackles of daily life and expreience adventures in God's own contry.
location: #467, CK Complex, 479, 4th Ave St, Teacher's Colony, 1st Block Koramangala, HSR Layout 5th Sector
description: The lush-green town of Wayanad in Kerala is hidden in the Malabar region on the Western Ghats. Sparsely populated, the forest-covered region abounds in picturesque hills meandered with streams, tea estates, and wildlife sanctuaries. Referred to as the ‘Spice Garden of India’, Wayanad is a hub of spices such as cardamom, star anise, fenugreek, black pepper, black cumin, etc. Adding to its treasures is Asia’s second largest and India’s largest damn, the Banasura Sagar Dam, and the Edakkal Caves from the Neolithic Age to trek to. Witness a majestic sunset at the backdrop of the dam, go hiking, mountaineering, camping, or rock climbing, you’ll never run out of fun activities at Wayanad.

title: Kodaikanal Weekend Getaway
subtitle: Get your freedom from the city noise and Experience Princess of Hill stations
location: #467, CK Complex, 479, 4th Ave St, Teacher's Colony, 1st Block Koramangala, HSR Layout 5th Sector
description: Kodaikanal, also known as the Princess of Hills in Tamil Nadu, is one of the most popular tourist destinations in South India. Often considered for a romantic weekend retreat, the quaint little town is blessed with a perfect temperature at any given season. If you are seeking time alone in the lap of nature with your loved ones, Kodai is the place to go. Adorned with cascading waterfalls, shimmering lakes, and undulating green hills, the town will leave you awestruck with its natural beauty.

title: Munnar Weekend Getaway
subtitle: Emrance the misty hills and relish your soul with the aroma of the tea estates.
location: #467, CK Complex, 479, 4th Ave St, Teacher's Colony, 1st Block Koramangala, HSR Layout 5th Sector
description: Munnar is a popular hill station located in the state of Kerala, India. It is known for its breathtaking landscapes, tea gardens, spice plantations, and cool climate, making it a favored destination for nature lovers and adventure enthusiasts. It is also known for its stunning landscapes, tea plantations, and pleasant weather. Munnar, with its scenic beauty, tea gardens, and tranquil ambiance, provides a perfect getaway to experience the charm of Kerala's hill stations

title: Ooty-Connoor Weekend Getaway
subtitle: Experience the serene Nilgiri Hills and relish the aroma of the tea estates.
location: #467, CK Complex, 479, 4th Ave St, Teacher's Colony, 1st Block Koramangala, HSR Layout 5th Sector
description:
Ooty and Coonoor are charming hill stations nestled in the Nilgiri Hills of Tamil Nadu, India. Here's a brief overview of each:

Also known as the "Queen of Hill Stations," Ooty is one of the most popular tourist destinations in South India. It boasts pleasant weather throughout the year, with cool temperatures making it a perfect retreat from the heat of the plains. Ooty is famous for its sprawling tea gardens, lush green landscapes, and picturesque viewpoints like Doddabetta Peak, offering panoramic views of the surrounding hills.

title: Gokarna-Murudeshwar Weekend Getaway
subtitle: Enjoy the beach paradise and the endless Arabian Sea views.
location: #467, CK Complex, 479, 4th Ave St, Teacher's Colony, 1st Block Koramangala, HSR Layout 5th Sector
description: What do you visualize if we ask you about a weekend on a beach? We would not be surprised if you say Goa. And that’s precisely why we need an alternative to Goa, one which is away from the humdrum of life, one which brings peace and serenity for the weekend. This is precisely what Gokarna offers. If you are looking for a place for an escapade, to take a break after the week-long 9-5 office hours, and are tired of glancing at pictures of breathtaking beaches on your monitor, go ahead and pack your bags already.

title: Hampi Weekend Getaway
subtitle: Experience Karnataka's favourite UNESCO heritage site and ancient beauty.
location: #467, CK Complex, 479, 4th Ave St, Teacher's Colony, 1st Block Koramangala, HSR Layout 5th Sector
description:
Explore the Ancient Beauty of Hampi, Karnataka

Hampi, once the Vijayanagara Empire's capital and now a UNESCO World Heritage Site, showcases over 500 ruins and monuments. Situated on the Tungabhadra River, Hampi's intricate architecture and breathtaking scenery reflect ancient India's grandeur. The Virupaksha Temple, dedicated to the empire's patron deity, stands as its most significant structure. Beyond its historical allure, Hampi offers modern attractions with aesthetic cafes, cultural performances, and diverse cuisines in nearby Hippie Town, making it a place for fresh perspectives.

title: Pondicherry Weekend Getaway
subtitle: Live your ' Sagar Kinare, Dil Yeh Pukare' Bollywood dreams.
location: #467, CK Complex, 479, 4th Ave St, Teacher's Colony, 1st Block Koramangala, HSR Layout 5th Sector
description: Pondicherry, often referred to as Puducherry, is a charming coastal town on the southeastern coast of India. Steeped in a unique blend of French and Indian influences, this Union Territory exudes a laid-back and multicultural vibe. The French Quarter, with its cobblestone streets and colonial architecture, transports you to a different era, while the bustling markets and vibrant Tamil culture showcase the town's diverse identity. With its serene beaches, like Promenade Beach and Paradise Beach, and the iconic Aurobindo Ashram, Pondicherry offers the perfect mix of relaxation and spiritual exploration. The delectable French-inspired cuisine and the colorful streets of the Auroville community further add to the town's distinctive allure. Pondicherry is a haven for those seeking a peaceful escape with a touch of cultural richness

title: SCC Picnic Cinema - 20 Years Of Hum Tum
subtitle: When the sun goes down the show comes on
location: 82/2, Gantiganahalli
description:
"Hum aur tum agar saath ho, phir mushqilain kaisi hain? Hum aur tum agar saath ho, phir mushqilain kaisi hain?" -Hum Tum 

Sunset Cinema Club invites you to join us as we celebrate two decades of love, laughter, and memories with our special screening of "Hum Tum"! Marking the 20th anniversary of this beloved romantic comedy, we invite you to relive the magic of Rhea and Karan's journey at Garden City Beer Collective (GCBC).

Come for an evening of cinematic delight, as the sun goes down, and the show comes on! Enjoy a picnic-y ambiance, where you can sit or even lie down on comfy bean bags, surrounded by lush green grass! String lights illuminate the area, casting a warm glow that sets the perfect mood for the evening, while you enjoy your favorite film on a large screen with surround sound accompanied with delicious munchies and drinks!

title: LIL MIC | A dowithlit Open Mic for Kids
subtitle: Step into a world of wonder and watch as young stars ignite the stage
location: SLR Arcade, Haralur Road, Apartments, near Prestige Ferns Residency
description: Hello Bengaluru! Calling all young superstars-in-the-making! Get ready to rock the mic and light up the stage at our famed open mics, now for kids🌟🎤 It's an explosion of talent as kids aged 5-13 unleash their inner rockstars, comedians, poets, and everything in between! With each act more electrifying than the last, this event is a rollercoaster ride of laughs, cheers, and jaw-dropping moments. Bring your friends, bring your family, and get ready to be blown away by the sheer awesomeness of our little performers!   DWL Open Mic brings you a platform to perform your poetry, stories, or music. Our open mics which became popular online during the lockdown, are now going around cities in India bringing like-minded artists together to perform, jam, and network. Perform or catch the best performances from some of the most talented artists in your city.

title: Vineeth Srinivasan Live
subtitle: A Musical Journey
location: Palm Meadows, Prestige Ozone, Whitefield Main Road, Whitefield, Devasandra Industrial Estate, Krishnarajapura
description: Join us for an unforgettable evening with Vineeth Srinivasan on 13th July 2024 at Phoenix Marketcity, Whitefield. Presented by Noizz Entertainment in association with Sia Entertainment, this concert promises to be a musical extravaganza.  Vineeth Srinivasan is a celebrated figure in the Indian music industry, renowned for his contributions to Indian cinema. Not only a star in the Malayalam music scene, Vineeth is also a multilingual singer, captivating audiences with songs in Tamil, Telugu, and Hindi. His melodic richness and emotional depth have made him a beloved artist!  Experience his famous hits like "Karale" from Ustad Hotel, "Anuraagam" from Thattathin Marayathu, "Akaleyo Nee" from Urumi, "Thangamey" from Naanum Rowdy Dhaan, and "Mental Madhilo" from Okka Kshanam. Don't miss this chance to see Vineeth Srinivasan live and witness his versatile talent firsthand!

title: Hard Rock
subtitle: Ft Vortex
location: 40-3, St Mark's Rd, Srinivas Nagar, Shanthala Nagar, Ashok Nagar
description:
Embark on a mesmerizing journey as the live band performance takes center stage, delivering an electrifying live performance that captures the essence of rhythmic magic. Immerse yourself in an unforgettable musical experience, where every note and beat harmonize to create an electrifying atmosphere, leaving you enchanted and immersed in the magic of music.


*Rs. 750 cover charge mandatory at the entry gate.

title: Classic Rock
subtitle: Ft Sentient Collective
location: 40-3, St Mark's Rd, Srinivas Nagar, Shanthala Nagar, Ashok Nagar
description:
Join us for an evening full of unforgettable music, and tremendous vibes, and catch The Sentient Collective playing live on 8th June, 9 pm onwards only at the Hard Rock Cafe, Bengaluru.
The magic of music will fill the air when The Sentient Collective will be performing live in the house!
Mark your calendars, everyone!!

*Rs. 500 cover charge mandatory at entry gate

title: Classic Rock
subtitle: Ft. Butterfingers
location: 40-3, St Mark's Rd, Srinivas Nagar, Shanthala Nagar, Ashok Nagar
description:
The Butterfingers….the band of brothers…err…band of friends are coming together again at Wanderers to enthrall you with Retro Recapture, as evening of music from the '60s through the '90s!
Highly versatile to make you swing and jive, Butterfingers will give you an evening to relive and revive your memories.
Dominic D’Cruz on Bass & Vocals; Eric Samuel on Guitar and vocals; Niranjan Joseph on Flute, Bass, and Vocals; Canute D’Cruz on Drums & Vocals, and Joshua Costa on the Key Board, the Fab Five of Bangalore are sure to thrill you with their music as they always do.

title: Tribute to Queen
subtitle: Ft Kapow (From Delhi)
location: 40-3, St Mark's Rd, Srinivas Nagar, Shanthala Nagar, Ashok Nagar
description:
BAM! Have you ever been hit with a punch so unexpected, it leaves you reeling? Well, that`s exactly what a KAPOW! performance feels like! With explosive energy and stage antics that will make your head spin, KAPOW! delivers exactly what you need and so much more! KAPOW!’s songwriting is both musically and lyrically diverse, from Pop-Rock ballads to eclectic Sci-Fi-inspired tracks. Their 1st album is a rollercoaster ride of musical genres. They even made history by becoming the FIRST INDIAN BAND TO GO DRAG during their album launch, all in the name of learning, experiencing, and creating awareness about Drag culture in India.

*Rs. 500 cover charge mandatory at entry gate.

title: Dimensions
subtitle: Live Music
location: 40-3, St Mark's Rd, Srinivas Nagar, Shanthala Nagar, Ashok Nagar
description:
Dimensions, a band that performs in various genres, was formed by rock renegades from Bangalore. With nearly 40 years of live music experience between the members of the band, the band`s primary focus is to re-create and offer the best live musical experiences to its audiences.
Be there to see them live at your favourite Hard Rock Cafe Bengaluru location.

title: Tribute to Eric Clapton & The Beatles
subtitle: Ft Crystal Codes
location: 40-3, St Mark's Rd, Srinivas Nagar, Shanthala Nagar, Ashok Nagar
description:
At the Hard Rock Cafe Whitefield, the progressive rock band Crystal Codes will pay homage to Eric Clapton and The Beatles.
If you are a Beatles or Eric Clapton fan, (how can you not be?) then join us for this memorable night at Hard Rock Cafe, Whitefield.
And of course, enjoy some beer and great bar fare as the ticket cost includes cover charges.

*Rs. 500 cover charge mandatory at entry gate.

Bring your friends and family to Hard Rock Cafe, Bengaluru for an unforgettable Karaoke night.
